system.description: When you cast a spell that targets only one creature and doesn’t have a range of Self, you can spend a number of sorcery points equal to the spell’s level (or 1 for a cantrip) to target a second creature in range with the same spell. To be eligible, a spell must be incapable of targeting more than one creature at the spell’s current level. For example, magic missile and scorching ray are ineligible, but ray of frost can be modified by Twinned Spell.
